releases.title: Uncrustify 0.80.1
releases.description:
### Pre compiled binaries for Windows

64 bits: [uncrustify-0.80.1_f-win64.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/17790167/uncrustify-0.80.1_f-win64.zip)
32 bits: [uncrustify-0.80.1_f-win32.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/17790168/uncrustify-0.80.1_f-win32.zip)

### Source code

[uncrustify-0.80.1.tar.gz](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/17790169/uncrustify-0.80.1.tar.gz)
[uncrustify-0.80.1.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/17790170/uncrustify-0.80.1.zip)

### Building from source

Please refer to the [build](https://github.com/uncrustify/uncrustify#build) section in the README file for instructions on how to build Uncrustify from source.
